data.title: La Robla Albergue is now OPEN!
data.meta_description: Just heard from Ender that the papers have been signed, and the bar and albergue will both open soon.  All that is needed is a signature or stamp or...
data.text:
Apr 16, 2023

#1

Just heard from Ender that the papers have been signed, and the bar and albergue will both open soon. All that is needed is a signature or stamp or something from the secretaría. This is such great news.

dreymorris

Member

Time of past OR future Camino

2018

Apr 17, 2023

#2

Just heard from Ender that the papers have been signed, and the bar and albergue will both open soon. All that is needed is a signature or stamp or something from the secretaría. This is such great news.

Great news!

trecile

Moderator

Time of past OR future Camino

Various routes 2016 - 2024

Apr 17, 2023

#3

Is this in the same building as when I walked in 2019? It was a good place to stay.

Apr 18, 2023

#4

Is this in the same building as when I walked in 2019? It was a good place to stay.

Yes, it's the same building. The bar adjacent to it will be managed by the same person. Apparently, it is the person who currently has the license to run the municipal pool, so people are very optimistic that it will be run well. It's a great albergue.

wisepilgrim

Camino App Maker

Time of past OR future Camino

Many

Apr 24, 2023

#5

I just saw this on the facebook group:

APERTURA DEL ALBERGUE DE LA ROBLA. Este lunes día 24 de Abril abre sus puertas el albergue. Laura será Su nueva hospitalera. Una gran noticia para este camino. La comunidad peregrina te desea mucha suerte Laura, el teléfono de contacto es: 682 541 836

Looks like it opens today!

F

Former member 59618

Guest

Apr 24, 2023

#6

I just saw this on the facebook group:

APERTURA DEL ALBERGUE DE LA ROBLA. Este lunes día 24 de Abril abre sus puertas el albergue. Laura será Su nueva hospitalera. Una gran noticia para este camino. La comunidad peregrina te desea mucha suerte Laura, el teléfono de contacto es: 682 541 836

Looks like it opens today!

I’m in Leon and seriously considering leaving the Frances and jumping on the Salvador. Maybe I’ll see them tomorrow!

Apr 24, 2023

#7

Woo hoo!

Good news for both Salvador and Olvidado pilgrims. Please let us know what you find if you do take that right turn, @truenorthpilgrim...and buen camino!

mla1

Veteran Member

Time of past OR future Camino

Madrid/Olvidado/Invierno (2023).

May 1, 2023

#8

Definitely open! Stayed there a few days ago. 8 bunks. Big kitchen. Microwave. The location in a park is fab. Later in the season there is a bar right there in the park. Laura the hospitalera comes in the evening for registering. And probably not of interest to those on the Salvador, but for those on the Olvidado there is excellent coffee in the croissanteria, which is open early!
